case.state: What's the sitch? Strip poker? I can do that.
I can do anything.
Game time.
I hope you're prepared to get your asses kicked!
I'm looking forward to seeing you naked.
~cards~ this time.
Hmm. Let's say ~cards~ this time?
~cards~ for me, please and thank you!
Time for Plan B. Give me ~cards~ cards!
Spankin'!
Feeling the love with this hand!
Totally not sweating it.
S'all good.
Everybody stay calm. I'm going to handle this.
Sweet!
The card thing is really no big.
As Ron would say: Boo-yah!
Nice!
Ready when you are!
Everything is under control.
Boys? Dating? It's hard. But poker? It's easy.
Bring it.
Whew! Safe - for now.
Ready? OK! Bring it on.
This helps.
I love your accent, Hermione! Which part of Britain are you from?
No big!
So not the drama!
I think I can work with these.
Let's just enjoy the game and relax.
Let's rock!
No big!
So not the drama!
I think I can work with these.
I'm sure Ron will have no problem fighting Dr. D while I'm here, right?
Let's just enjoy the game and relax.
Let's rock!
I'm giving this game 110%!
Not feeling one hundred percent on these cards.
Think positive thoughts, Kim!
Only missed a royal flush by four cards this time.
Okay, let's make the best of this!
I can win this game on my own. I know I can.
Hey! My eyes are up here.
I... I should be okay with these.
Cut the chatter! I'm working.
I still have one last line of defence!
It's not over yet!
Crunch time! I need four of a kind five minutes ago.
Man!
These cards? So not helping.
Anything is possible for a Possible! Like winning despite these cards.
Something's not right here.
Got a serious 911 on my hands.
This is so bad it might just work!
I'm giving you the puppy dog pout right now. Don't you want to fold?
I'm a straight-A student! Poker shouldn't be this hard!
You know, it would be awfully convenient if a supervillain tried to take over the world right around... now! ...No? Figures.
Of all the times for my Kimmunicator to be quiet...
This could get dangerous!
I'm Kim Possible! I can do anything! I think...
...I am so toast.
I should have stuck to babysitting.
I'm so history.
I'm doomed.
OK, I'm getting a little freaked out here.
I can't believe I'm going to have to touch myself. I am so freaking!
Can't win 'em all!
Me again?
I think I can handle this.
It only seems fair for me to take something off at this point.
My turn.
I'd feel embarrassed if I weren't winning.
Just a sec!
Would you believe this is all part of my plan?
Oh, well. When in Rome...
You've been waiting all night for this moment, haven't you?
Maybe this will cheer you up?
You beat me fair and square.
No big! At least, not until I have to explain it to Ron.
So it's my turn, is it?
Okay, I lost. No big.
Fearless, I am not.
That's me, isn't it? Darn it.
So not the drama. I can make this work.
I'm down but not out! Just wait and see - I can still win this game.
Maybe I need a plan "B".
Saving the world doesn't make it easier to win at cards. Who knew?
Oh, come on. If I can do anything, I can keep myself from getting embarrassed. Totally mind over matter.
I can do anything! ...Even strip in front of an audience.
I'm tired of playing defence. I'm takin' the fight to you!
This is better than being stuck in a death trap. Kinda.
My life is so over.
I'm fine. And not embarrassed. Not embarrassed in the least.
I'll go first - no big. Someone has to!
I'm okay. My pride? Not so much.
Argh! Not again!
Are you sure those hands are legit?
Maybe I ought to stick to saving the world from evil geniuses.
I don't get it. Why are you all after me?
'Play strip poker,' they said. 'It'll be fun,' they said.
My weird-ar is going off. I think someone is cheating!
Maybe the whole trying-to-act-cool thing isn't my best option right now.
This cannot be happening.
Remember, Kim! You can do anything! Gulp.
So, obviously mistakes were made. By me.
I'm beginning to suspect this is one of Drakken's plans to kill me through sheer embarrassment.
This is so my worst nightmare.
Boots first.
Now the gloves come off! In both senses of the term.
You know, I was beginning to wonder why I wore this utility belt. Guess it's useful after all!
And the shirt comes off. Like it? It's from Club Banana.
It was a brand new Club Banana. Quick! Where's the closest mall?
Well, it's pants time. Somehow I'm reminded of Ron right now...
Now to show you the twins. Not Jim and Tim, these!
Don't panic, Kim... just think of it as Cheer Camp all over again.
Just remember our deal, Streaming-chan: I get 40% of the gross and streaming rights on my website.
Just to show I'm not a sore loser, I'll take off my socks, too.
I'm not going to hold back any more. Deal.
Want to see me naked? That sounds great... in the magical world of 'Not Gonna Happen'.
Do you know how much babysitting I had to do for it?
And off they go!
Like what you see?
And I'm naked... Can this get any worse? Don't answer that!
Guess it's your turn, ~name~.
Winning is fun!
Aaaand it's ~name~'s turn to strip!
Nice move, genius.

Ah, the reason we're all here.

The classic ~clothing~ gambit, huh? Too bad it won't save you.

You're awfully good at this game, ~name~.
So not what I wanted to see you take off.

Oh, good. Your ~clothing~.

Don't make me hurt you!
~name~! I'm in the moment here!
Do you know how long I've been waiting for you to lose a hand, and for what? For that?
Let's get back to playing so you can lose even more!
I think I'm getting the hang of this game!
A point for Team Possible!
This is fun, isn't it?
Now I'm imagining you naked. Good job, Kim.
Am I just awful at this game?
I guess I'll have to teach you how to lose at strip poker!
I can't begin to describe my feelings of joy that you wore your ~clothing~ today.
You're already on thin ice with me, OK? Can you just try to be somewhat normal?
Seriously: how are you still dressed?
This is so not how I expected this game to go.
There's probably a message here about being a sore loser or something.
Fun.
No offence, ~name~, but that seemed kinda desperate.
Speaking as someone with experience with mystical ninjas, you're better off this way.
You say that like it's a bad thing, Samus!
You really thought that would work? Oh, Shego.
Neat trick - too bad it only works once.
Sure that counts, but don't you want to... live a little?

Nice one, ~name~!
This is low, even for you, ~name~.
That's it - take off your ~clothing~.
Good move, ~name~.

So not how I was hoping this game would go!
So sad.

Oh, good. Your ~clothing~.
Are you for real?
I am so not believing this!
Do you know what I really hate?
Don't even mess with me.
Oh, you're really pissing me off now.

This game is a mind-numbing waste of cards.
Can you believe this? Someone needs to put ~name~ in her place!
You are seriously into roleplaying. I should introduce you to Cousin Larry.
Go ahead and try it - you don't scare me!
Care to put your money where your mouth is, D.Va?
Like you weren't serious already? Sure, let's go with that.
Actually, there's something about a princess removing her tiara that really turns me on...
I bet it's not half as good as how I'm feeling right now!
I, um, I wonder if you'd autograph something for me after the game?
You look familiar, Angela. Were you ever at the UN?
Is-- That can't possibly be blood on your ~clothing~, can it?
But do you think your viewers will like it?
I feel like I should be taking notes - you've got such great taste in clothes!
We redheads have to stick together.
Do you think I could try on your ~clothing~ now that you're done? I've always wanted to pretend to be a princess.
This is going to be one messed up video.
I hate that you're like that while I'm standing here freezing my butt off.
Don't get cocky, Kim! It's too early to celebrate.
This is just the beginning!
I see you came prepared, ~name~.
Nice move, ~name~!
Do you think I could try on your ~clothing~ now that you're done?
Moving along!
I guess it's a start.

And you were wearing your ~clothing~ why?
And we should care about this why?
Seriously... here I am in my underwear! And you're only now losing your ~clothing~?!
I can't begin to describe my feelings of joy that you wore your ~clothing~ today.
What is with you?
Will you get over yourself? Some of us have real issues to deal with.
I hate that you're like that while I'm standing here freezing my butt off.
Why... why does this feel so good?

What's your secret?
Not cool, ~name~.

Aw, really?

~name~, quit fooling around!

Chalk up another win for me!

Ugh. Really?

What's wrong? Don't you like me?
Aw, you're no fun!

This cannot be happening.

Up for another round?
Gotta say, this is more fun than I thought it would be.

Yep, real exciting.
It means one less item to remove.
...When I said 'no big' I wasn't giving instructions!
This is ridiculous.
You really don't understand girls, do you?
Of course, I'm still losing.
Yet you're still beating the pants off me. Might be time to switch strategies.
~name~, stop playing around!
While studying international diplomacy I learned to say 'good game' instead of 'cheap move.' So... good game, ~name~.
What exactly is your problem with me?
Spoilsport!
Give me something to work with here!
I know sixteen types of Kung Fu. Are you sure that's what you want to take off?
It's official: I've hit rock bottom.
Really? 'Cause you look hotter this way to me.
A point is a point, Shego!
You call that stylish? Girl, you're in a worse state than I realized.
Don't take this the wrong way, but I don't have a great track record with mad scientists, ~name~.
Hey, if that's the most you take off you'll be having a great night.
Well, well. Looks like ~name~ is losing.
This game might be easier than I thought...
Your ~clothing~? Sounds like a good place to start!
Just your ~clothing~? Swell.

Chillin' ~clothing~, ~name~.

Smart thinking, ~name~!
Are you guys teaming up against me?

Are you for real?
...That figures.
Rub it in, why don't you? While I rub one out.
Could someone pinch me so I can wake up from this nightmare?
I've been played!
Trust me, I understand you one hundred percent, Buffy.
Have we met before, Jasmine? On a mission, maybe?
They're not ugly, Kyoko. Nothing about you could be.
Trust me, I know.
If you were really that evil, would you be playing games with me?
I'll be watching you closely...
This is just the beginning for you!
Go ahead and gloat - you'll be naked soon enough.
Serves you right!
Just think - the evening is young!
Aw, I think you're blushing!
This is promising...
Up for another round?
You've got to start somewhere!
Fair enough.

Things are looking up!
Don't think this is the end for you. Not by a long shot!
...You're predictable.
...When I said 'no big' I wasn't giving instructions!
The good: ~name~ is taking off her ~clothing~. The less good: I'm shivering here in my underwear.
I feel so ridiculous around you.
I guess that's the way the cookie crumbles, huh?
Not seeing the fun one hundred percent here, guys. Unless the 'fun' is seeing how badly I can blush...
Gosh, thanks a mil.
This is just making me self-conscious!

This is ludicrous!
You know, in your own way you're more evil than any supervillain.

Don't mind me! I'm just watching.
Slammin'.
Always the gentleman!

case.state: Off it goes!

I wish I'd discovered this game back in high school.
You look good without your ~clothing~.
Good, ~name~. Real good.
A girl could get used to this...
Dear Diary: today was a good day!

You sure took your time!
What comes around, goes around.
Stop it, Kim! Don't stare at him! You have a boyfriend!
Mm, nice.
I know exactly what you mean, Buffy! That's why I wear these. Roomy, yet fashionable.

I guess 'she can do anything' applies to poker, huh?

Own it, girl!

It's good nobody's paying attention to me right now...
The way you're stripping is... really sexy.

Well, that's... stripey.
I see you've got that whole 'matching outfit' thing going for you.
Girlfriend, after this game I am gonna take you bra shopping. Trust me.

This tells me far more about your personal life than I ever wanted to know.
Wait... were you wearing that when we fought?

Oh, they are cute. Totally.
Not just a girl, Hermione - a gorgeous girl!

Chest binding? But that means you're even bigger than I--
I'd play this a lot more if I was single like you! Especially if you were playing...
Love your attitude, ~name~! And also your body.
I mean, I've seen worse. A lot worse.
Huh; I guess you really are a girl under those clothes, ~name~.

I wish I'd discovered this game back in high school.
That didn't take long.
Oh, yeah, this I could get used to!

Trust me, you have nothing to be ashamed of.

I love your underwear! ...And hate my lack of it.
You seem awfully calm, ~name~. I guess you're sitting pretty compared to me...
Your awkward looks just make this more exciting, ~name~.
Do you even know how beautiful you are?

I'm glad I came tonight!
~name~ has to strip? No way!
That's why we all came here!

Wow! You must be an athlete!
So worth coming.
Whew! It's getting hot in here.
Not bad, ~name~.

I'm waaaaiting, ~name~!

Oh! It's tiny! Not... not that I'm judging.

I think he likes me!

If you're looking for a girlfriend, I've got a few friends who are available...

I had no idea they came in that size in real life!
You fit all that in there?
Except, um, a little bigger than I expected.

Okay, Kim... imagine Drakken in the buff... imagine DNAmy... ah! It's not working!
Hee hee! It is fun to let loose now and then!
I love ~name~! You know, for his brains.
Oh. My. God.
This game? Worth it.
I think I will too!
Do you even know what shame is?
You just couldn't resist, could you?
You can add Kim Possible to that list!
Boy do I know that feeling! It's nice to let loose without the parents around, isn't it?
...So what's the protocol for a naked princess? Am I supposed to curtsy?
Lose something, ~name~? Your underwear? The game? Your dignity?
What's the big deal? It's nothing your boyfriend hasn't seen already.
Just think of it as a state function! ...In the nude.
Stop staring at me like that, ~name~. I feel bad enough as it is.

You don't seem too worried...
Calm in the face of danger much?
Not so fancy now, are you?
You're adorable when you blush...
So not the drama, ~name~. This isn't a horror movie.
I DO enjoy seeing you squirm, ~name~.

Not so cocky now, are you?

Twice as cute, though.

You really--! But that means I'll have to--! Ohhh.

It's nice not to come in last in the chest department for a change!
You're so cute! Is that a blush? I just want to eat you up!
They're so perky! You ought to be more confident.
We could be twins!

I think those might be my new favourites!
Ten out of ten from me, Angela!
R-rated? Why stop there? We could make a killer home video together...
Although you're somehow just as elegant as before.

You really--! But that means I'll have to--! Ohhh.
OK. This is starting to get weird.
It's not that cold in here...
Girl, you have nothing to be ashamed of!
So getting tired of every girl beating me in the chest department.

Very nice, ~name~.
Speaking of rubbing, I wouldn't mind getting a feel of those, ~name~.
There's always room in the 'naked losers club'.

Don't be a poor loser, Nugi-chan.
She's a princess, she's gorgeous, she's naked... and I'm taken. Why me?
You really--! But that means I'll have to--! Ohhh.

They're still jiggling? Wow, that's... hypnotizing...
Wow. Just... wow.
I didn't have a size complex until now.
Hmph. My boyfriend says more than a handful is a waste.
Looks like a lot has rubbed off on you. Wow!
I'm jealous!

Aw, c'mon, Jasmine - we're not strangers any more, are we?
Wait, what?
That's an unexpected twist.
Game. Set. Match!
Well, that's the last of them!
You know, I've seen a lot of naked girls in the locker room, but not up close.
Are you really going to--?
I was head cheerleader at Middleton. Trust me, ~name~ - it's nothing I haven't seen before.
Give up, ~name~?
You're going to be completely naked!
That won't help - I'm not into girls.
Don't worry, we'll keep this a secret between us girls!
Oh, I wouldn't exactly say that, Asuna.
O-of course not! Just a few flings! Oh. You were talking to ~player~, weren't you?
Yeah, that's not how I'm playing this.
Aww, don't cry, ~name~! It's not the end of the world.
Well, that was... different.
Aww, don't cry, ~name~! It could be worse!
Aww, don't cry, ~name~! It could be worse...
Aww, don't cry, ~name~! It gets easier the longer you stay naked...
Says one naked girl to another...
Aww, don't cry, ~name~! It's not that bad - trust me!
Without even a hint of a blush. What have I gotten myself into?
Maybe there are some things that should be impossible.
But there's a real difference between them and you.
Your boyfriend has no idea how lucky he is.
Guess that answers that question. Wow. You're so smooth!
Okay, I stand corrected. None of them were daring enough to shave.
I love what you've done with it. It's so smooth...
Speaking of secrets: tell me, do you shave or wax it? I don't see any stubble!
Did I miss something? Is this really just an orgy? Nobody told me!
You want to keep playing? But you've got nothing left to bet!
I've been missing out.
Beautiful! I... I... I don't know what to say!
Guess that answers that question. Wow.
I appreciate the view, though!
I didn't think so.
Welcome to my world.
Not that there's anything wrong with naked. On you it's good.
Not into... girls... uh! At all! Oh God!
When I'm around you I can't think straight. Pun intended.
...And Wade, who's probably filming this.
Just between us girls, you look good enough to eat!
I'll make you a deal: you don't tell my boyfriend, I won't tell your girlfriend.
Are we actually going to do this?
OK, we're over the weird limit here. Way over the weird limit.
Wait, I have some questions about this.
You're weird! Luckily, I like weird.
I should probably look away, but... I'm not going to!
So loving this game!
I can't believe I'm going to see ~name~ jerk himself off!
Looks like you lost, ~name~. You know what that means...
Yes! Getting closer to victory!
And now for the main event!
Just for the record: I have a boyfriend. I'm faithful to him.
Oh yeah!
Don't you have a girlfriend? Isn't this kind of... cheating?
This is sick and wrong!
I'm not sure what you're doing, but it's kinda weirding me out.
This is so many levels of not right!
Maximum strangeness.
Being honest, this is turning me on.
This is a guy thing, isn't it? You have no shame at all.
It's funny - usually I'm the one doing the-- what are you making me say?!?
I could cheer you on if it would help.
If I close my eyes, I can imagine you're Ron...
It's getting bigger!
This isn't cheating...
Start your engines, ~name~!
Sick and wrong. And fascinating.
I'd rather be anywhere but here!
Wow, ~name~'s really going at it, isn't he?
Someday I want to inspire that much passion...
I see you don't need help!
The blush factor is approaching critical here.
Am I turning you on that much?
Must think of Ron, not ~name~... Must think of Ron...
This is so going into my personal spank bank.
I think I'm up for a rematch, if you know what I mean.
So... That just happened...
This just got so much weirder.
Oh, please, ~name~! I just ate!
Wow. Just... wow.
This is sicker than the time Ron put diablo sauce on pancakes!
That was... something else!
Aw, man! That's gonna stain!
If my dad knew half of what was going on here, I'd be grounded for life.
Do you always cum that much? That was a gusher!
Wow, now that's a mouthful! What a waste.
Aw, over already?
Is that all for me?
Did I do that? Wow.

state.text: You know, ~name~, there's something to be said for subtlety. Try it sometime.

case.state: Are we actually going to do this?
This is just too weird.
You're sure this is legit, ~name~?
Naked and losing is a bad combination, ~name~.
Game over!
We just entered the freak zone.
Score another one for Team Possible!
Guess you should have worn more layers, ~name~.
Impossible? No. Kim Possible.
Time to show what you're made of, ~name~.
I think we all know what comes next.
Pop quiz, ~name~. Strip poker plus losing equals what?
Ooh!
Love your timing.
C'mon! It's fun!
I think this is the beginning of a very weird friendship.
~name~'s up! Come on, don't be shy.
Buffy, you dog! You were hoping to lose, weren't you?
K-kigo? How did you--I mean, I have no idea what that means!
What are you playing at now, Shego?
I remember asking Santa for a pony when I was a girl. This isn't what I meant!
...Key word usually? Go on.
I'm not sure anyone would believe me even if I did tell them!
I wish my enemies used magic like that; I could solve all my problems with a slumber party!
Trust me, Jasmine. You're more than good enough for me.
No deal, April. Not even if you sang it naked.
No deal, April. If I have to do it, you do too!
No deal, April. If I had to do it, you do too!
This has to be the most heinous game ever.
Oh, this is so wrong.
This is just too weird.
Hold it. What are you doing?!
~name~, this really isn't necessary!
I can't believe you're really--!!
Ohh... well... the thing is... you-you just sort of... um... I cant believe this is happening!
Oh! I guess I should look away. I'm not going to, but I should.
Don't worry - it's nothing I haven't seen before.
Somebody loves herself a little too much.
I could cheer you on if it would help!
Go for it, ~name~!
Just pretend you need to impress me to get on the Cheer Squad.
If it helps, I've already imagined you doing this.
Y-yeah, rub that button...
I mean, it's nothing you haven't seen already today...
Don't you think you're taking this joke too far, Shego?
Stop that, Shego! You know I have a boyfriend.
This is my teenage fantasy come to life!
Hey, Hermione... ever wonder if your Ron is as good in bed as mine? ...Wanna find out?
Wow. That's really hot when you say that in an accent...
Sick and wrong. And fascinating.
I'm watching, but I'm not believing.
I can still hear you moaning...
That's... mesmerizing, somehow.
Faster! Rub it like you mean it!
I see you don't need help!
Sitting here in my panties, looking at you... this is just like cheerleading auditions!
Your technique is good, but I bet I could teach you a thing or two...
How close are you, ~name~?
This brings back so many memories from my cheerleading days...
Wow. There's definitely a few things you could teach me!
Enjoying yourself?
So, um, I have a boyfriend... and he's into threesomes... talk later?
So... That just happened...
OK, this is a 9.7 on the weirdness scale.
Is it hot in here, or is it just me? Whew.
~name~, you sorta kinda rock.
I'm... just a little bit jealous. Could I be that bold?
I miss Tara... I should give her a call.
Let's hurry and deal the next hand! I can't wait any longer!
Way to go, ~name~.
Believe me, you'd make the cheer squad if I was still in charge.
Couldn't wait for me to join you? Too bad.
Wait for me! I'm-I'm almost there!
Very inspiring, ~name~. Very inspiring.
Dont take it too hard, ~name~. No one can say youre a quitter!
Sigh! I'm just not programmed to say no.
Deep breath, then take the plunge. Here goes.
Oh, come on, I'm sure I've faced worse. ...Did you say masturbate?
Here's where I show you I can and will do anything.
I never choke. Ever. Check the motto. I can do anything.
Calm down, Kim... just ignore Shego. It's not like she hasn't had me in worse positions!
Calm down, Kim... just think of Ron... or Shego.
Calm down, Kim... just think of Ron... or Shego.
I can handle some "me" time.
Mmm, yes... ooh!
Just like that...
I really wish Ron was here to lend a hand...
Please...
Oh, yes! Yes! Yesss!
I don't want to see this online later. I've got a website and I'm not afraid to use it!
This was... actually pretty fun!
This is exactly like Cheer Camp!
So... when's the next game?
So glad Ron can't see me now.
This was almost as embarrassing as cheerleading practice.
Great. Now I've got to find Ron to apologize.
Some things about college will not be missed. This game is one of them.
I guess I really am all that.
Oh, hey, Wade! Just playing strip poker. Want to see the losers?
Anything is possible for a Possible!
It's just like my website says: I really can do anything.
So not the drama!
I'm full of surprises!
Spankin'! ...Maybe literally? ...I'm so turned on right now!
Where's my Kimmunicator? I need Ron five minutes ago!
Maybe you should, Hermione.
Wha-- you're going to tell Ron? I thought we were friends!
Brightest, maybe. Modest? Not so much.
You won't get away with this, ~name~!
Wow, ~name~! Way to step up!
I've never been beaten this badly in my life! I DEMAND A REMATCH!
And I thought I was the impossible one...
Not half bad, ~name~ - but I still got my licks in!
Just wait until next time! ...There will be a next time, won't there?
I'm so happy for you, ~name~.
I can't believe I cashed in a favor so I could play.
There's always something you can learn from any experience, even if you lose.
I'm okay. My pride? Not so much.
Defeated by ~name~? This is a personal low.

scene.directive: Thanks for coming!
It's Ron's birthday today, and I wanted to make it extra special.
I'm not the sharing kind...
If we called up Yori or Tara I'd jell so much.
It could ruin everything! I--I can't risk that. Not with him.
But you?
You're perfect.
And it's not like you wouldn't be a present for me, either...
I can't stop thinking about that game...
I know he has fantasies about other women.
You know what? I do too.
C'mere and let's get started! He'll be home any minute now, and I want a chance to try you out first!
Thanks for coming!
I'm glad you showed up.
I just can't believe how easily you beat me at poker.
Me! Kim Possible!
I want a rematch.
...And I've been practicing.
I agreed to your terms. Perv.
Notice: cheerleader costume on. Pom poms, even.
The rest of the team agreed to play, too.
(Personally, I think Bonnie just wants to see me naked...)
We've all agreed to the new rules. And my parents are away at a conference, so there's nothing to worry about.
Just remember it cuts both ways.
If you lose... you're ours.
...I WANT A REMATCH!
Oh, hello, ~name~. Ron told me you'd be coming to join their little study session.
I didn't even know you were going to Middleton U!
They're both upstairs already. Can you believe it? First day of spring break, and they can't wait to hit the books!
I guess Kim takes after me!
Anyway, go on up.
Yes! Yes! Y--OHMIGOD!
Ron! Stop! Put me down! At least slow down!
Oh, hey ~name~! Thanks for coming.
Thanks for-- Ron, what's going on?!?
What's the big deal, K.P.? You said you wanted to try bukkake.
I thought you meant that new Japanese restaurant! Not some freaky sex act!
To borrow a phrase from you: THIS IS SICK AND WRONG!
But... you always say you can do anything! I mean, it's on your website.
Ron Stoppable! Just because I had a sex life before we were going out doesn't make me a slut like Bonnie!
First of all, Josh was just a crush...
And how could I say no to Tara? She just wanted to thank me...
And that time with Brick was just because I was stuck to Bonnie during their date. Literally.
And-- you know what, this isn't important! What's important is where did you even hear about this?
Oh, it's something Yori taught me when I was training with her in Japan.
Yori? Cute ninja whose life you saved Yori? The one who still has a crush on you? THAT Yori?
Get those pants off, ~name~. We're doing bukkake right now!
Aw, yeah... that's good, K.P.!
I think... I think I'm gonna blow!
Open your mouth and say 'ahh.'
Ahhh--ACK!
That wasn't so bad.
But next threesome, I get to choose. Got it?
Admit it, Ron - I am the best girlfriend. EVER.
Oh, Kimmie! I brought you and your friends some snacks to help you study!
I guess you really do take after me, huh.
